channel.title: Run.Bat problem. please help!
channel.description: so my source has been fine since i started my server then last night i wanted to run the server again and i got this error i tried to erase the files i modified but nothing seems to work. if anyone knows how to fix it please help me out. Thanks

item.title: Run.Bat problem. please help!
item.dc:creator: @beast14 beast14
item.description:
@beast14 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:545468”][quote author=beast14 link=topic=664348.msg4441061#msg4441061 date=1406651227]

use an IDE, and you wont be running this kind of trouble

i am but still dont know what file im getting the problem from
[/quote]
prices.txt it looks like.

The error is because it’s trying to convert a string (which appears to be empty) to an integer and it can’t.
I say prices.txt because generally that’s where prices are loaded from.

You could find out the code causing the error by looking in ItemHandler.java on line 321.[/quote]
correct!!! THANK YOU! figured it out after i posted this but still thank you for helping using knowledge not telling me to use a program

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat problem. please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“beast14, post:3, topic:545468”][quote author=Strucker link=topic=664348.msg4441052#msg4441052 date=1406649982]
use an IDE, and you wont be running this kind of trouble
[/quote]
i am but still dont know what file im getting the problem from[/quote]
prices.txt it looks like.

The error is because it’s trying to convert a string (which appears to be empty) to an integer and it can’t.
I say prices.txt because generally that’s where prices are loaded from.

You could find out the code causing the error by looking in ItemHandler.java on line 321.

Read full topic
